title: Amazing Diety
review: Towards the month of August you will see people walking from Gujarat & other states to reach the Baba Ramdev Temple.

title: Interesting place on the way between banker and jaisalmer
review: The temple is a short detour from the road between Baniker and Jaisalmer.   A small market leads into the temple.

title: BabaRamdev Temple
review: This temple is famous with the name of RAMDEVRA. Million people have faith in Baba Ramdev and came here on foot from very distance. This temple is situated on the Bikaner-Jaisalmer Road and only 1km inside from the main Highway. Must visit.

title: A Sad Presentation for such a revered Baba
review: The whole staff needs replacing what a lazy, dirty and surly group and that includes the police.  An occasional smile and welcome would go along way in making the temple more appealing. And get rid of the demanding beggars who are everywhere.  No I don't believe that giving one of these monsters will buy me salvation.  It felt like people were being shaken down for donations and not even given a moment to pray and respect the Baba.

title: Baba Ramdev Temple
review: Its my first time visit to any Ramdev temple and so excited to know about this holly place. Fortunately mandir was not over crowded so enough time could spent infront of Ramdevji.

title: Baba Ramdev Temple
review: thie temple is hindu temple. peaceful place. worth to visit. if you have prayed anything from heart, that will become true. people have faith in God Ramdev. this place is also known as Ramdevra and Rama pir. visited this place only once but so much satisfied. shopping vendors are also there.

title: Ramdevra
review: Visited this temple n the way from bikaner to jaisalmer, just 2-3 kms of the highway near to Pokhran. Baba Ramdev is revered deity in rajasthan esp in western parts and many people from far away places visit the place by foot. There was no big rush during our visit so have darshan very easily and peacefully, otherwise we can imagine crowd by seeing the barricades in place. Felt good to have darshans. Though its is much visited place still temple authorities seems less bothered to provide facilities and conveniences to visitors with no proper car parking pace, only option is provided by shopkeepers only if you buy prasad (quite expensive), no place for shows again pay to  somebody to take care, baggers are all around. It is always nice to visit local temples and deities as it reflects the true culture of place and stick your visit to temple only.

title: Amazed
review: Peoples all around the India came to the temple once in a year and we can imagine how popular it is. We were told by the priest about the miracle place temple truely well worth to visit while near to jaisalmer.

title: Quick one day trip
review: Had been to Baba ramdev samadhi along with in laws and cousins from wife side. Climate was quite cold. It was a peaceful journey and darshan as it was not crowded. People from many background and faith believe in Baba Ramdev.

title: Religious temple of Ram Dev
review: The Baba Ramdev temple is situated in Ramdevera village and is dedicated to Baba RamDev.The temple is famous among the locals for its religious significance.Rajasthani and Gujrati People often visit this temple.

title: A tribute to Baba Ramdev
review: Famous for its wooden horses and religious pilgrim for devotees of Baba Ramdev!!! History of Baba Ramdeva and his devotion for his country people were well depicted through pictures and idols in the temple!!!

title: On way to Jaiselmer from Jodhpur
review: The temple is on way to Jaiselmer from Jodhpur near famous Pokhran village in Ramdevra.

title: Jai baba ramdev
review: A small peaceful place...baba ramdev temple is the main attraction of this place n it is a delight to know about him..we took his story book too...i liked the whole trip all in all

title: a famous temple for Hindus and muslim at Ramdevra
review: The saint Ramdeo or Ramdevra is worshipped by Hindus and Muslims of entire Rajasthan and neighbouring states .

title: Great Place of Worship
review: In a Ramdevra village, there are only two main attractions. One of them is this Ramdevra Temple.This temple is famous for Baba Ramdev Pir, a ruler of fourteenth century, said to have miraculous powers who devoted his life for the up liftment of downtrodden and poor people of the society. A large fair known as Ramdevera Fair is held here from Bhado Sudi 2 to Bhado Sudi 10 (Aug - Sept). It is attended by a large number of devotees irrespective of their caste or religious. So if possible avoid this time othewise very peaceful temple. you will find very economical overnight accommodation here. confirm the Darshan time before visit.

title: Holy Place Baba Ramdevra
review: This is one of the famous temple in Rajasthan. A lot of people have faith in Baba Ramdevra. In August many piligrams travel by feet from long distances. We had a last minute sight as temple open till 9pm only. Trust need to care a lot about cleaning & Drinking facilities for devotees.

title: Avoid
review: Good if you are one of his blind followers I am sure,  But certainly not worth a visit for anyone else

title: oct visit
review: saw it in the evening around 6 pm. there were No Crowds. Luck for us. Day time will have serpentine Q. small village but lot of faith of people. Don't worry on hygiene. It is faith that drives crowds.

title: ramapir Baba Darshan
review: Early Morning Aarti experience was wonderful

title: Religious
review: On our way from jodhpur to jaisalmer this temple is mid way near pokran. We visit this temple every year. Strong belief. All religion people are welcome here. There is a maans a devi chuda- bangle like made of stone. They say if you pass by this bangle your prayers might come true.

title: Great Temple
review: This is a big spritual location for visitor. from Rajasthan, gujarat & other area visitor come there for Baba ramdev

title: worship at its peak here
review: nice location its a must visit place if you ra travelling to rajasthan. a very old temple in name of baba ramdev .

title: A must visit for all Ramdev Baba devotees
review: Nice Temple, do not miss the evening maha-aarti. The best place to stay at Ramdevra is Shiv Shakti Hotel that is just a walk away from the main temple. Shiv Shkati hotel rooms are ok, however, the service of their people working there and food is excellent.

title: very known place
review: Lot of people visit Ramdevera temple, Earlier the village was known as Runeche and named as ramdevera.

title: Ramdevra trip
review: Ramdevra is a village situated about 12 km to the north of Pokhran in Jaisalmer district of Rajasthan in India.A large fair known as Ramdevera Fair is held here from Bhado Sudi 2 to Bhado Sudi 10

title: A historic religious place on route from Jaisalmer to Jodhpur
review: We are on a trip on Jaisalmer and Jodhpur. And as it's on route (just around 12 Kms from Pokhran) we prefer to visit it.

title: One of the Monument defining unity of Hindu and Muslim
review: Bhagvan Ramdevji Maharaj was a Tunvar Rajput regarded by Hindus as the incarnation of Lord Krishna. History goes that five Pirs from Mecca came to test his miraculous powers and after being convinced, paid their homage to him. Since then he is respected by Muslims as Ramshahpir or Ramapir. The fame of Ramapir reached far and wide. He believed in the equality of all human beings, both high and low, rich and poor. He helped the down trodden by granting them their wishes. Bhagvan Ramdevji Maharaj took samadhi (conscious exit from the mortal body.) in 1459A.D. Maharaj Ganga Singh of Bikaner constructed a temple around the samadhi in 1931A.D.

title: Ramdevra
review: Temple visit is not a must. But going by the local tradition it is a must visit for the locals. But incase you are not a follower can give it a miss. The shops lined outside force you to buy prasadam and similar stuff and when you reach there the pujaris donot bother also to to offer the same to the God.

title: Way to jodhpur
review: We were going from jodhpur to jaisalmer someone suggested to cover ramdevra mandir.its samadhi of ramdev ji.and approximately 135 km from jodhpur.ramdevji  was great supporter and well wishers of poor people.he was famous for his horse ride so in all shopes symbolic horse are for sale.

title: Place of faith and trust
review: just before 120 kms from Ramdevra is located where famous ramdev Temple attracts lakhs of devotees from Hindu and Muslim religion without discrimination. In fact ramdev is incarnation of Lord krishna,praised by lakhs of devotees from Gujrat and Rajasthan, anicely developed temple in town is certainly place to visit and there hundreds of nice places to stay at very cheap rates, managed by charitable socoial organisations.

title: Faith
review: This is the Samadhi of Baba Ramdev i.e. he breathed his last here. The belief is to offer a symbolic horse if a wish is fulfilled and people come here with great faith. The queue up is systematic but takes atleast 10-15 minutes to reach inside the Temple.

title: Monuments to Jaisalmer's Royals
review: We stopped here as part of a half day safari tour and were the only visitors. A cluster of yellow sandstone chhatris stand as monuments to Jaisalmer's royal family. You can walk freely amongst them and it's surprisingly peaceful. Great for pictures.

title: Faith in the gods
review: To visit the famous temple of Ramdevra is absolutely worthwhile.

title: its amizing
review: i like baba ramdev temple . every one like .Very highly devoted place by rajsthan and all Indians....well maintained and nice organization to handle loads of devotees coming on occasions.

title: Deeply Spiritual
review: On the Jodhpur-Jaisalmer highway there is a place called Pokhran. Famous Ramdev Temple is situated at a distance of about 15 kms from Pokhran. The place is called Ramdevra. During our Jaisalmer visit we had decided that we will surely visit the place and I can squarely say that our decision was very right.

title: Nice and peaceful place
review: Bab Ramdev temple was really nice place. The lord was covered with lot and lots of flowers. Many people play offerings and the Aarti is just not to miss.

title: A good place for Ramdev Baba's believers
review: This is the place where people claim that Ramdev Baba had taken samadhi. Its good to see that lot of people from corners of India visiting this place (a few kms away from Pokaran) to pay a visit at this temple.

title: Full devotion
review: Wow, what a place and such a nice time to go there. No crowd, no lines, clear and clean compound. Could have darshan twice in 15 minutes. The surroundings need to be maintained otherwise a must visit place in Pokharan.

title: Must visit
review: We liked the history surrounding the temple. It's a very famous temple in Rajasthan and a very holy place too.

title: jay babe ri......
review: Baba ramdev ,runicha ..or many other names for babaRamdev, people wish and wishes become true .

title: Personal visit to get Blessings of Baba Ramdev
review: Trusted by lacs of devotees and known by a deity popular for blessings to all, Baba Ramdev Temple is very powerful.

title: One of a kind temple
review: The diety Ramdevji of this shrine is worshipped by all casts of India. Be it muslims or hindus. Both religions believe in this temple.

title: good religious place
review: good vibrations  ,peaceful atmosphere when we visited as there was no rush of people at that time , can be accommodated in the trip of Jaisalmer and Jodhpur. 2to 3 hours extra time required for visit, good parking facality

title: Devoted place..
review: Very highly devoted place by Indians....well maintained and nice organization to handle loads of devotees coming on occasions.

title: If you are a believer..
review: The temple is known as a poor man's temple, because it has been one of the few temples that accepted any visitor - irrespective of his caste. My respect for the place went up a few notches because of this.
